import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';const TextBox=()=>{const texts=['Welcome!','This','is','Abdullah','Siddique,','a','programmer💻,','a','science enthusiast🔬,','and','a','blogger✍️.'];const[displayedText,setDisplayedText]=useState('');const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{if(currentIndex<texts.length){setDisplayedText(prevText=>prevText+' '+texts[currentIndex]);setCurrentIndex(currentIndex+1);}else{clearInterval(interval);}},800);// Adjust the delay time (in milliseconds) as needed
return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[texts,currentIndex]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"text-box",style:{textAlign:'center',fontSize:'1.5rem'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{style:{fontSize:'1.6rem'}},displayedText));};export default TextBox;
